name: Virtual Pirate VR
description:
Become a Pirate!
You are a pirate using pistol and cutlass. Show your superior skills to the enemy.

Fire Pistol!
Pistol is a weapon that can kill enemies in the distance. Fire the enemies before they approach you. You can also head shot by targeting the enemy's head.

Using Cutlass!
Cutlass is a good weapon that not only can attack the enemy, but also can defend the enemy's attack. You can also slice the flying object (Skull, Shark, Bomb...etc.)

Kill the Kraken!
You can fight Kraken. Kraken is huge and powerful. You can kill it by shooting Kraken's leg and its eyes. Good luck.

Challenge the record!
Your play is recorded online. You can be the best record in the world. Make your legend.

With your friends
If you and your friend are online, you can team up with a friend, and six people can play a team battle at the same time. Recommend this game to your friends right now.
